class.name: VisualScriptScriptClass
class.brief_description: A Visual Script node for accessing global script classes defined in any language.
class.description: A Visual Script node for accessing global script classes defined in any language.

method.name: get_script_class
method.description: Returns the name of the currently selected global Script class.

method.name: set_script_class
method.description: Assigns a new global Script class name, changing which reference this node returns.
